bibl.title: Contra Potentium Iniurias: The Defensor Civitatis and Late Roman Justice.

series.title: Münchener Beiträge zur Papyrusforschung und antiken Rechtsgeschichte.

bibl.note: 1. Introduction. - 2. The Prehistory of the Defensor Civitatis and the Reforms of Diocletian. - 3. The Constantinian Defensor. - 4. The Defensor as Protector (364-382). - 5. Mission Creep: Changes in Selection and Duties (383-400). - 6. The Defensor in the Early Fifth Century. - 7. The Bishop as Alternative. - Appendix: Known Defensores Civitatum (326-c. 420). Select Bibliography of Secondary Sources. Index of Citations of Ancient Sources discussed in Text [pp. 248-250: e) Papyri].
bibl.seg: FRAKES Robert M., Contra Potentium Iniurias: The Defensor Civitatis and Late Roman Justice. (Münchener Beiträge zur Papyrusforschung und antiken Rechtsgeschichte. 90.)

1. Introduction. - 2. The Prehistory of the Defensor Civitatis and the Reforms of Diocletian. - 3. The Constantinian Defensor. - 4. The Defensor as Protector (364-382). - 5. Mission Creep: Changes in Selection and Duties (383-400). - 6. The Defensor in the Early Fifth Century. - 7. The Bishop as Alternative. - Appendix: Known Defensores Civitatum (326-c. 420).
